Articles.Content:
Hey everyone! I just wanted to tell you about a new car/plane I just made, the F1 2030. completely stock, and it looks cool, But i need a little help with the flying. it should fly well, but something is wrong. The wheels just won't cooperate. So I had to put it on to a Rocket holder, and add a rocket to it. the download link is http://kerbalx.com/Concodroid/F-1-2030

(note this craft is completely *stock*.) And if anyone can change the design so It can take off without the Rocket holder, go right ahead.
What kind of trouble are you having with the wheels?
So, (almost) every craft I make turns when it takes off. I read another post somewhere about it.
set the angle snap to none before placing your wheels with mirrored symmetry

Yes, landing gear that is placed at any angle other than perpendicular to the ground will try to pull to one side or the other. Also, if the craft is heavy enough to flex under its own weight so that the gear tilts will have the same problem.
Try unlocking plus limiting the front gear steering to overcome it.
